long_description: The Horny Toad Muse Skirt features a soft, stretchy fabric that lends a vacation vibe to your everyday life, perfect for bringing the beach back to the office. Organic cotton blended with rayon and a touch of added stretch is lightweight, breathable and feels great next to skin. Elastic waistband with adjustable drawcord on the side provides a comfortable, custom fit. Single side patch pocket stores a key, credit card or other small item. Closeout.
short_description: The Horny Toad Muse Skirt features a soft, stretchy fabric that lends a vacation vibe to your everyday life, perfect for bringing the beach back to the office.
